title: Government anticipates legal action over plans to reform judicial review
description: Report warns court challenges and overly complex regulatory system could stall infrastructure improvements
content:
There will be challenges, possibly including legal challenges, to the Governments plans to reform when and how people can take judicial reviews against infrastructure projects.
